text: Hedda is a 1975 British drama movie directed by Trevor Nunn and was adapted by Henrik Ibsen's play Hedda Gabler. It stars Glenda Jackson in her Oscar nominated performance, Peter Eyre, Timothy West, Patrick Stewart and Pam St. Clement. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on plays
title: Hedda (movie)
